          This class is used to draw a 3D scene consisting of detector groups.

          This Node draws colored markers of a specified type and size at the specified points.
 class PixelPositionedBox
          This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth in the specified orientation at the specified point.

 class Node

Uses of IGL_Renderable in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups

Uses of IGL_Renderable in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms
 

Classes in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms that implement IGL_Renderable
 class MatrixTransform
          Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using multiplication by a specified 4x4 matrix.
 class OrientationTransform
          This class represents transformation nodes that both "rotate" an object to align it's x and y axes to specified "base" and "up" directions AND translates the "center" of the object to a specified position.
 class Rotate
          Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using rotation by a specified angle around a specified 3D axis.
 class Scale
          Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using scaling by specified scale factors in the x, y and z directions.
 class TransformGroup
          This is the abstract base class for group nodes that apply a transformation BEFORE rendering their child nodes.
 class Translate
          This class implements Group nodes that transform their children using translation by a specified 3D vector.
 

Uses of IGL_Renderable in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Lights
 

Classes in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Lights that implement IGL_Renderable
 class DirectionalLight
          This class represents lights that have a direction only.
 class Light
          This class is an abstract base class for nodes of a scene graph that represent lights.
 class PointLight
          This class represents lights that have a particular position in the 3D virtual world.
 class SpotLight
          This class represents spot lights that have both a position and direction.
 

Uses of IGL_Renderable in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Shapes
 

Classes in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Shapes that implement IGL_Renderable
 class BezierCurve
          This class draws a Bezier curve using the specified control points.
 class BezierSurface
          This class draws a Bezier surface patch.
 class Box
          This class draws a 3D wire frame box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
 class Circle
          This class draws a 2d circle of the specified radius centered at the origin.
 class Line
          This class draws a 2d line from one point to another.
 class PixelBox
          This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
 class PlanarSurface
          This class draws a rectangular plane surface in the x-z plane, centered at the origin, split into many smaller rectangles, to provide more vertices for the OpenGL lighting calculation.
 class Shape
          This is the abstract base class for scene graph nodes that represent actual objects that are drawn.
 class SolidBox
          This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth centered at the origin.
 class Sphere
          This class draws a solid sphere of the specified radius centered at the origin.
 class StrokeText
          A StrokeText object draws a character string with a specified size, orientation and alignment, using a StrokedFont object to draw the individual characters as a sequence of line segments.

          This Node draws a colored segmented line through the specified vertices, in the order specified.

          This Node does a basic draw of a parallelogram facet.
 class Polymarker
          This Node draws colored markers of a specified type and size at the specified points.
 class PositionedBox
          This class draws a solid box of the specified width, height and depth in the specified orientation at the specified point.
 class SimpleShape
          Abstract base class for simple 3D objects that are not textured, and whose color is set by the current color, rather than with all of the possible material properties.

Classes in SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.StateControls that implement IGL_Renderable

          This node allows turning back face culling on and off in the course of rendering a scene graph.
 class LightingOnOff
          This node allows turning lighting on and off in the course of rendering a scene graph.
 class NormalizeOnOff
          This node allows turning automatic normalization of surface normals on and off in the course of rendering a scene graph.
 

Uses of IGL_Renderable in SSG_Tools.Viewers
 

Methods in SSG_Tools.Viewers that return IGL_Renderable
 IGL_Renderable JoglPanel.getScene()
          Get a reference to the IGL_Renderable object that is drawn by this panel.
 

Methods in SSG_Tools.Viewers with parameters of type IGL_Renderable
 void JoglPanel.setScene(IGL_Renderable new_scene)
          Set a new IGL_Renderable object to be drawn by this panel.
 

Constructors in SSG_Tools.Viewers with parameters of type IGL_Renderable
JoglPanel(IGL_Renderable scene)
          This constructor constructs a heavy weight GLCanvas object using the default capabilities, and internally, constructs a GLEventListener that will actually do the drawing when the canvas is exposed, resized, etc.
JoglPanel(IGL_Renderable scene, boolean is_heavy)
          This constructor constructs either a a heavy-weight GLCanvas object or a light-weight GLJPanel object, using the default capabilities.
JoglPanel(IGL_Renderable scene, boolean is_heavy, int mode)
          This constructor constructs either a a heavy-weight GLCanvas object or a light-weight GLJPanel object, using the default capabilities, with DEBUG_MODE or TRACE_MODE turned on.
